com.mapbox.mapboxsdk.plugins.building

Class BuildingPlugin

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mapbox.mapboxsdk.plugins.building.BuildingPlugin

  • public final class BuildingPlugin
extends Object
    The building plugin allows you to add 3d buildings FillExtrusionLayer to the Mapbox Maps SDK for Android v5.1.0.

    Initialise this plugin in the OnMapReadyCallback.onMapReady(MapboxMap) and provide a valid instance of MapView and MapboxMap.

    • Use setVisibility(boolean)} to show buildings from this plugin.
    • Use setColor(int) to change the color of the buildings from this plugin.
    • Use setOpacity(float) to change the opacity of the buildings from this plugin.

        public boolean isVisible()
        Returns true if the traffic plugin is currently enabled.
        Returns:
        true if enabled, false otherwise

        Parameters:

      • setOpacity

        public void setOpacity(float opacity)
        Change the building opacity. Calls into changing the fill extrusion fill opacity.
        Parameters:
        opacity - float value between 0 (invisible) and 1 (solid)
        Since:
        0.1.0

      • setColor

        public void setColor(int color)
        Change the building color. Calls into changing the fill extrusion fill color.
        Parameters:
        color - an Int value which represents a color
        Since:
        0.1.0

      • setMinZoomLevel

        public void setMinZoomLevel(float minZoomLevel)
        Change the building min zoom level. This is the minimum zoom level where buildings will start to show. useful to limit showing buildings at higher zoom levels.
        Parameters:
        minZoomLevel - a float value between the maps minimum and maximum zoom level which defines at which level the buildings should show up
        Since:
        0.1.0
